title: Mastery Level Announcements
body: The mastery level announcements are not showing. As you can see in that link I just posted, every time a level 5, 6 or 7 gets a kill or dies, it is suppose to display this. However, mine does not. I find this really inconvenient. Has anyone else had this problem before? If you have, do you have a solution?

replies.body:
[A repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) may resolve this, as there could be missing assets for these banners. 

If you continue to have issues seeing these, [grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of what you're seeing.
